title: Twisted Treeline was a terrible choice for Ocean week, no one plays it often enough
body: Bonus points for a bad map, sad times. Missing out on Mystery champ is gonna suck

replies.body: That may be, but by doing it we lose the Ocean week, since no one likes the damn map
I think it's to encourage more people to play the map.
Just pick Dr. Mundo. It's a free win.
